meanings.definition: Making a sharp noise when bitten or crushed
meanings.sent1: The crunchy leaves under my feet sounded like popcorn popping.
meanings.sent2: I love the crunchy sound of biting into a crispy apple.
meanings.sent3: The crunchy chips were so loud, they woke up the whole house!
meanings.sent4: Her crunchy footsteps echoed through the empty hallway.
meanings.sent5: The crunchy snow crunched beneath my boots as I walked.

meanings.definition: Having a texture that is firm and crisp
meanings.sent1: The crunchy celery was refreshing and satisfying to eat.
meanings.sent2: The crunchy toast was perfectly golden brown and delicious.
meanings.sent3: She loved the crunchy sound her shoes made on the freshly fallen snow.
meanings.sent4: The crunchy lettuce added a nice contrast to the soft sandwich.
meanings.sent5: The crunchy cookie crumbled in my mouth, releasing bursts of flavor.

meanings.definition: Describing food that is easily broken into small pieces with a loud noise
meanings.sent1: The crunchy cereal was my favorite breakfast treat.
meanings.sent2: The crunchy crackers were perfect for snacking on the go.
meanings.sent3: The crunchy popcorn flew everywhere when the bag burst open.
meanings.sent4: The crunchy granola bar shattered into pieces when I bit into it.
meanings.sent5: The crunchy taco shell broke apart with a satisfying snap as I took a bite.
